cs3500.music.model

Class JMidiComposition

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs3500.music.model.JMidiComposition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IjMidiComposition

    public class JMidiComposition
extends java.lang.Object
implements IjMidiComposition
    The class Represents a MIDI Track that can be played with the assigned parameters.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  JMidiComposition.Builder
      the class Builds a cs3500.music.model.JMidiComposition according to the default values or the ones directed by the user.
